meanings.definition: The art or craft of decorating objects with paper cut-outs.
meanings.sent1: Decoupaging is a fun way to decorate things with paper cut-outs.
meanings.sent2: She learned decoupaging to decorate her jewelry box.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled while decoupaging their notebooks with colorful paper.
meanings.sent4: Her decoupaging skills turned the plain vase into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The exhibition showcased the intricate decoupaging on various items.

meanings.sent1: I enjoy decoupaging my scrapbook with different patterns.
meanings.sent2: They decoupage the furniture to give it a unique look.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally decoupaged his shirt with comic strips instead of fabric.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity shines through when she decoupages old jars.
meanings.sent5: The artist carefully decoupaged the entire canvas with delicate paper pieces.
